headline: Unusual Volume in Las Vegas Sands Call Options - Investors Bullish on Macao Gambling
summary: There has been a huge, unusual volume in long-dated call options for Las Vegas Sands today after its Q2 results release yesterday. It showed investors are bullish on the Macao gambling scene. Huge volume traded in in-the-money (ITM) calls.

headline: Las Vegas Sands' Q2 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Stock Up
summary: LVS posts strong second-quarter results driven by strength in Singapore, improved services and Macao investments.
